Engines.name: Impeller Mk1
Engines.description: Our entry-level model, the Impeller Mk1 generates an adequate amount of thrust.

Engines.name: Impeller Mk2
Engines.description: A slight improvement over the Mk1, the Impeller Mk2 will give you a little extra push to get where you're going a little faster

Engines.name: Impeller Mk3
Engines.description: The top of the Impeller line, the Mk3 will have you zooming through space faster than you thought possible.

Engines.name: Fusion Drive Mk1
Engines.description: Representing a breakthrough in propulsion technology, the Fusion Drive Mk1 uses all-new fusion pulse technology to send you to the farthest reaches of the galaxy in style.

Engines.name: Fusion Drive Mk2
Engines.description: A marked improvement over the Mk2. Smoother ride, more thrust, you'll be the envy of everyone you pass.

Engines.name: Fusion Drive Mk3
Engines.description: Just when we thought we couldn't improve on the Mk2, our scientists stumbled upon another breakthrough! The best propulsion system money can buy.

Shields.name: Defender Mk1
Shields.description: Our entry level shield generator, the Defender Mk1 provides basic protection from light laser fire and navigational hazards.

Shields.name: Defender Mk2
Shields.description: A slight improvement over the Mk1, the Defender Mk2 will give you a little extra push to get where you're going a little faster

Shields.name: Defender Mk3
Shields.description: Our top of the line model, the Defender Mk3 will keep you safe no matter what dangers you're facing down

Cargo.name: Small Cargo Hold
Cargo.description: So smol. It fits a few things, but not much more than your basic ship.

Cargo.name: Medium Cargo Hold
Cargo.description: Ok, now we're getting somewhere. With improved carrying capacity, the medium cargo hold will let you handle...well...medium-sized jobs.

Cargo.name: Large Cargo Hold
Cargo.description: If we could fit any more space into the large cargo hold, we'd be arrested for violating the fundamental laws of spacetime. This baby will hold so much cargo, you'll have your debt paid off in no time!
